fields.label: 1. Name of Investor
fields.summary: Write Last, First, Middle, Suffix, and Other Legal Name (if any).

fields.label: 2. Permanent Home Address
fields.summary: Write full residential address (no P.O. Box).

fields.label: 3. Zip Code (Permanent)
fields.summary: Write ZIP code for permanent address.

fields.label: 4. Present Home Address
fields.summary: Write full current address (no P.O. Box). Tick if same as Permanent.

fields.label: 5. Zip Code (Present)
fields.summary: Write ZIP code for present address.

fields.label: 6. Mobile Phone Number
fields.summary: Write in international format (e.g., +63-9123456789).

fields.label: 7. Birthdate
fields.summary: Write DD-MMM-YYYY (e.g., 14-MAY-2000).

fields.label: 8. Citizenship(s)/Nationality
fields.summary: List all citizenships/nationalities.

fields.label: 9. Business/Work Phone Number
fields.summary: Write office phone in +Country-Area-Number format.

fields.label: 10. Home Phone Number
fields.summary: Write landline in +Country-Area-Number format.

fields.label: 11. Sex (at birth)
fields.summary: Tick: Male or Female.

fields.label: 12. Civil Status
fields.summary: Tick: Single • Married • Common Law • Separated • Widowed.

fields.label: 13. Birthplace
fields.summary: Write City, Province/State, and Country.

fields.label: 14. E-mail Address
fields.summary: Write active email address.

fields.label: 15. Occupation
fields.summary: Write job title (e.g., Teacher, Engineer, Business Owner).

fields.label: 16. Nature of Business/Work
fields.summary: Write industry/business type (e.g., Retail, IT, Health).

fields.label: 17. Name of Business/Employer
fields.summary: Write company or employer name.

fields.label: 18. Gross Annual Income
fields.summary: Write income bracket or exact amount.

fields.label: 19. Work Address
fields.summary: Write complete work address (no P.O. Box).

fields.label: 20. Zip Code (Work)
fields.summary: Write ZIP code for work address.

fields.label: 21. Preferred Mailing Address
fields.summary: Tick: Permanent • Present • Work.

fields.label: 22. SSS/GSIS No.
fields.summary: Write valid SSS or GSIS number.

fields.label: 23. Philippine Tax Identification No. (TIN)
fields.summary: Write full TIN (9 digits).

fields.label: 24. ID(s) Presented
fields.summary: Write type(s) of valid ID submitted.

fields.label: 25. ID Number(s)
fields.summary: Write ID number(s).

fields.label: 26. ID Expiry Date
fields.summary: Write DD-MMM-YYYY.

fields.label: 27. Are you a U.S. Person?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, write U.S. TIN (SSN, EIN, or ITIN).

fields.label: 28. Politically Exposed Person (PEP)
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, write Name(s), Relationship(s), Agency/Position(s).

fields.label: 29. Source of Funds
fields.summary: Tick all that apply: • Sale of Assets (specify) • Time Deposits/Investments • Remittances/Allowance/Gift • Business Income (specify) • Rentals • Commissions/Professional Fees • Inheritance (specify) • Salaries/Bonus/Retirement/Pension • Insurance/Pre-need Proceeds • Others (specify).

fields.label: 30. Third Party / Beneficial Owner (Individual)
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No for each: a) funds investments b) has access/interest in account c) on whose behalf transaction is made. If Yes, fill Name, Relationship, Birthdate, Citizenship, Occupation, Address, TIN, Phone.

fields.label: 31–33. Third Party/Beneficial Owner Details
fields.summary: Fill Name, Relationship, Address, Birthdate, Citizenship, Occupation, Phone.

fields.label: 34–37. Additional Third Party Details
fields.summary: Fill Birthdate, Birthplace, Sex, TIN.

fields.label: 41–47. Third Party Entity Details
fields.summary: If Entity: fill Name, Relationship to Investor, Type (corp/partnership), Nature of Business, TIN, Country of Incorporation, Date of Incorporation.

fields.label: 48. Liquidity
fields.summary: Tick one: • <5% • 5–15% • 16–25% • 26–35% • >35% of investible assets.

fields.label: 49. Investment Objective
fields.summary: Tick one: • Capital Preservation • Regular Income • Income & Growth • Capital Growth • Capital Appreciation.

fields.label: 50. Investment Horizon
fields.summary: Tick time horizon (e.g., <1 yr, 1–3 yrs, 3–5 yrs, >5 yrs).

fields.label: 51. Knowledge
fields.summary: Tick knowledge level: No knowledge • Limited • Moderate • Good • Extensive.

fields.label: 52. Experience
fields.summary: Tick years investing: <1 yr • 1–2 yrs • 3–5 yrs • 6–10 yrs • >10 yrs.

fields.label: 53. Risk Tolerance
fields.summary: Tick % willing to invest in high-risk: <20% • 21–40% • 41–60% • 61–80% • >80%.

fields.label: 54. Financial Situation
fields.summary: Tick one: need income, some stability, stable, or fully secure (per options in form).

fields.label: 55–56. Suitability Waiver
fields.summary: If investing in higher-risk funds than profile: tick acknowledgment and write reason.

sections.title: E. Terms & Conditions / F. Data Privacy & Laws

fields.label: General Acknowledgments
fields.summary: By signing, you accept SLAMCI’s Terms, Privacy Policy, FCPA, AMLA/TFPSA compliance, shareholder rights, and account rules.

fields.label: 57. Printed Name & Signature of Investor
fields.summary: Sign above printed name.

fields.label: 58. Date Signed
fields.summary: Write DD-MMM-YYYY.

fields.label: 59. Consent for Promotions
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No to receive personalized offers/communications.

fields.label: 60. Recommended Fund(s)
fields.summary: Write recommended funds (if any).

fields.label: 61. Investor’s Selected Fund(s)
fields.summary: Write selected funds.

fields.label: 62. KYC Method
fields.summary: Tick: In-person • Remote/digital (video call).

fields.label: 63. KYC Details
fields.summary: Describe how you met/knew the investor.

fields.label: 64. Printed Name & Signature of MF Rep/Broker
fields.summary: MF rep signs; write name.

fields.label: 65. A.R. No.
fields.summary: Write A.R. (Authority to Represent) number issued.

fields.label: 66. Date Signed (Rep/Broker)
fields.summary: Write DD-MMM-YYYY.

fields.label: 67–69. Rep Code / Branch / Lead Conversion No.
fields.summary: Write code, branch, and lead number.

fields.label: 70–72. Date/Time Received, Receiving Dept/Office
fields.summary: Write when/where received.

fields.label: 73. Remarks
fields.summary: Write remarks if any.
